title: The history of the moderne protestant divines containing their parents, countries, education, studies, lives, and the yeare of our Lord in which they dyed. With a true register of all their severall treatises, and writings that are extant. Faithfully translated out of Latine by D.L.
author: Verheiden, Jacob, fl. 1590.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by N. and Iohn Okes [are to be sold by Andrew Crooke at ye Bare in Paules church yard],
